remarks: An element of the base set of the base set of the category of extensible structures (i.e. the base set of an extensible structure) belongs to the considered weak universe.  (Contributed by AV, 22-Mar-2020.)
statement:
estrcbasbas.c $e |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
estrcbasbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
estrcbasbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
estrcbasbas $p |- ( ( ph /\ E e. B ) -> ( Base ` E ) e. U ) $.
